meanings.definition: A competition to determine the best team or player in a particular sport.
meanings.sent1: The championship was won by the fastest runner.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed her championship trophy.
meanings.sent3: The championship game ended in a tie, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to training led him to the championship.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered loudly as the championship match began.

meanings.definition: The position or title of being the best in a particular sport or activity.
meanings.sent1: After years of hard work, she finally achieved the championship.
meanings.sent2: The championship brought fame and recognition to the winner.
meanings.sent3: Wearing a crown, he jokingly declared himself the championship of chess.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, the championship was a symbol of success and perseverance.
meanings.sent5: The championship belt gleamed under the bright lights of the arena.
